fields.Name: Tide of Iron
fields.Flavor: After each swing, you use your shield to shove your foe backward, and then you surge ahead.
fields.Rules: Requirement: You must be using a shield. Target: One creature Attack: Strength vs. AC Hit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you can push the target 1 square if it is no larger than one size category larger than you. You can then shift 1 square into the space that the target left. Level 21: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
fields.RulesHTML: Requirement: You must be using a shield. Target: One creature Attack: Strength vs. AC Hit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you can push the target 1 square if it is no larger than one size category larger than you. You can then shift 1 square into the space that the target left. Level 21: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
